metadata.documentation: EartH2Observe, WFDEI and ERA-Interim data Merged and Bias-corrected for ISIMIP (EWEMBI)
Potsdam Institute for Climate Impact Research, Research Domain Climate Impacts and Vulnerability, Potsdam, Germany
Historical input data set prepared for ISIMIP2b.
Cite as Stefan Lange (2016) EartH2Observe, WFDEI and ERA-Interim data Merged and Bias-corrected for ISIMIP (EWEMBI), GFZ Data Services, doi:10.5880/pik.2016.004

Dataset included in the User Data Gateway (UDG, http://www.meteo.unican.es/udg-wiki) maintained by the Santander MetGroup. Register and accept the data policy to access to this dataset. This dataset is freely available under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0). For the ISIMIP Terms of Use please visit: https://esg.pik-potsdam.de/projects/esgf-pik/tou.
